testsuite.name: Inbox page

testcase.name: Inbox page should return a 200 when requesting the inbox page
Inbox page should return a 200 when initialising the inbox view in activity
Inbox page should return a 200 when requesting messages
Inbox page should return a 200 when requesting the activity stream list
Inbox page should return a 204 when requesting a different view for the inbox
Inbox page should return a 204 when saving a differet list height
Inbox page should return a 200 when requesting unread only messages
Inbox page should return a 204 when requesting all messages as read
Inbox page should return a 204 when pining inbox to the homeview
Inbox page should return a 204 when marking a message as unread
Inbox page should return a 204 when marking a message as read
Inbox page should return a 200 when updating the active item
Inbox page should return a 200 when getting fullcontent of a message
